name: Mvcimage
body:
This is a MVC3 ASP.NET Project to show how to:

a) Handle Images
b) Preview Images using JQuery/AJAX
c) Upload images to a Database using Entity Framework and SQL Server Express

This Project has been created in conjunction with blog posts I have written:

http://garfbradazweb.wordpress.com/2012/02/26/mvc-3-mvcimage-project-its-alive/
tagline: MVC 3 Project using Entity Framework to show how to Preview Images and Upload them to a SQL Express Database.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
